entries.name: Adventurer's Pack
entries.description: A torch, bedroll, scrap of jerky, apple, pipe, and rope. This rucksack has been through so much, you're not sure what's inside.

entries.name: Miner's Pack
entries.description: Pick hammer, lantern, fire-starting oil and flint, compass, breather mask. A heavy duty canvas pack scuffed with coal and chalk.

entries.name: Polar Pack
entries.description: This fur-lined pack is built into a warm seal skin cloak. It contains a fire pot, fur mittens, snow-blind goggles, ski poles, boots and rope.

entries.name: Fisherman's Satchel
entries.description: Mesh creel, two fishing poles, tackle box, fillet knife and basket snare. Also includes swim fins and a clumsy glass diving mask.

entries.name: Mender's Toolbox
entries.description: Hammer and pliers, rivets, scrap steel, leather strips, spare buckles and iron nails. Use for anything from armor to boat repair.

entries.name: Healer's Case
entries.description: Using this kit of bandages, tinctures and serums, heal 1 HP on an ally with an INT or WIS roll. Includes bottles, scalpel, and anti-venom.

entries.name: Climbing Gear
entries.description: Grapple hooks, extreme rope, steel belt clips, 2 pairs of boot crampons, iron spikes and hammer. Worn over one shoulder.

entries.name: Mixed Armor Garb
entries.description: Common garb for adventurers, a mix of padded gambeson, leather belts, and armor odds & ends. +2 DEFENSE

entries.name: Heavy Plate and Chain Armor
entries.description: A cumbersome set of steel plates, chainmail, and steel boots for heavy combat. +4 DEFENSE, DEX rolls always HARD

entries.name: Common Shield
entries.description: A round wooden shield and strap suited for travel on foot. +2 DEFENSE. If hit, sacrifice the shield to absorb all of any 1 attack.

entries.name: Iron Shield
entries.description: This heavy shield is steel with iron bands. +3 DEFENSE. While using this shield, you cannot use one hand, occupies 2 inventory spaces.

entries.name: Traveler's Garb
entries.description: A lighter, more comfortable set of clothes for travelers. Only +1 DEFENSE, but includes 2 extra spaces for inventory.

entries.name: Sword and Scabbard
entries.description: A trusty blade of whatever size or make suits your training, leather sheath, belts, and sharpening kit if the blade is damaged.

entries.name: Battle Axe and Harness
entries.description: A huge chopping weapon of one or two blades. Damage timbers or structures, but impossible to conceal.

entries.name: Spearman's Kit
entries.description: A ten foot oak shaft with swappable blade tip that can be switched to hook, spearhead, or glaive. Can attack targets up to NEAR range.

entries.name: Bow and Quiver
entries.description: A recurve bow, either short for small spaces or long for outdoor use. Quiver empty on attack rolls of natural 1. Carry a spare quiver if possible!

entries.name: Crossbow and Bolt Kit
entries.description: A powerful mechanical weapon. Critical hits on natural 19 or 20. The bolt kit allows for incendiary, smoke, or flare tips.

entries.name: Warhammer
entries.description: A hefty, blocky weapon for smashing. Hits of 5-10 damage destroy 1 point of enemy DEFENSE, 10+ also stuns the target for 1 ROUND.

entries.name: Great Sword
entries.description: A tremendous two-handed blade 5 feet long. This weapon occupies 3 inventory spaces, but always inflicts ULTIMATE damage.

entries.name: Knife Belt
entries.description: A sling of sorts which holds up to 8 daggers and throwing knives in concealed scabbards. One scabbard includes a poison-protective sheath.

entries.name: Knight's Weapon Kit
entries.description: A heavy black belt with a spiked mace and chain flail on steel rings. Used against shields, degrades DEFENSE by 1 on each hit.

entries.name: Quarter Staff and Wraps
entries.description: A wooden walking staff fire tempered for hardness, 4 feet in length. Includes fist-wraps for unarmed fighters.

entries.name: Exotic Weaponry
entries.description: Strange or unusual weapons from far away lands include chain whips, nunchaku, segment staff, and sword-of-rings. Work with your GM!

entries.name: Maps
entries.description: A humble wooden tube filled with regional maps and specific location plan views. Roll INT to check for a useful map once per location.

table_name: Warp Shell Basic Loot - Packs & Armor

entries.name: Scan Unit
entries.description: A compact, comprehensive scanner and electronics unit. Use 1 TURN to 'run a scan.' The data gathered reduces the current TARGET by 1.

entries.name: Away Team Pack
entries.description: Belt pouch with hand lamp, micro cutting torch, reel of cable, leak sealant slap-patch, 10 minute air canister, and emergency locator beacon.

entries.name: Salvage Kit
entries.description: A backpack for deep space retrieval. Heavy winch grappler, heavy cutting torch, 2 magnet anchors, pick hammer, 2 magnetic flood lights.

entries.name: Xeno Response Pack
entries.description: Tools for collecting / analyzing biological specimens. Collapsible clear tube, respirator, dissection kit, sample vials.

entries.name: Medical Kit
entries.description: Emergency first aid with bandages and antidotes. Roll WIS or INT to heal an ally for 1 HP. On a natural 1, the kit is empty. Refill on any ship.

entries.name: Vac Suit
entries.description: +1 DEFENSE. Nanotechnology integrates into any clothing for deep space operation, including energy helmet, gloves, and x-wave radio unit.

entries.name: Hard Suit
entries.description: +3 DEFENSE. A vac suit with an armored exterior for dangerous space work. DEX rolls are never EASY, stealth rolls only succeed on natural 20.

entries.name: Link Armor
entries.description: +1 DEFENSE. A light reinforcement to any clothing made from tiny links of nonmetallic ceramic material.

entries.name: Plasteel Armor
entries.description: +3 DEFENSE. Heavy armor plating ignores any attack of 2 or less damage, but the bulk of it makes DEX rolls always HARD.

entries.name: Energy Shield
entries.description: A small wrist unit that is activated to emit a glowing round force shield. +2 DEFENSE. DEFENSE rolls against energy weapons are EASY.

entries.name: Vibro Blade
entries.description: A duranium blade with vibrating nano-blades to enhance cutting effect. Critical success on natural 19 or 20. Also unbreakable by physical means.

entries.name: Energy Blade
entries.description: An elegant weapon from a civilized time. Does ENERGY damage. On a natural 1, the weightless blade cuts its user for 1 HP damage.

table_name: Warp Shell Basic Loot - Weapons & Items

entries.name: Pulse Rifle
entries.description: Advanced Reptoid war tech, uses a power cell as ammo. It never runs out. On a natural 1, the rifle goes wild, hitting a random target.

entries.name: Particle Cannon
entries.description: A heavy military weapon. Occupies 3 inventory slots. Sprays of fire hit 1D4 enemy targets on a successful attack, each taking the damage rolled.

entries.name: Blast Rifle
entries.description: A classic, reliable long gun. Spend 1 TURN aiming to either hit with no roll or inflict maximum damage on a rolled hit.

entries.name: Blaster
entries.description: The sturdy, basic sidearm of space. Easily concealed under any armor or clothes. Occupies NO inventory space. 'Spacer's best friend.'

entries.name: Chem Rail
entries.description: A charged ion rail gun that slowly builds powerful shots. Add another GUN damage die for each TURN spent powering up a single shot.

entries.name: Ripsaw
entries.description: A carbon-toothed chainsaw weapon designed to tear apart armor and equipment. For each 5 damage inflicted, remove 1 DEFENSE, or destroy 1 item.

entries.name: Ion Grenade Sling
entries.description: A bandolier of 6 explosives which can work on a D4 ROUND fuse or be set to explode on impact. ULTIMATE damage in a NEAR radius.

entries.name: Karambit Blades
entries.description: Small talon knives designed for killing. Occupies no inventory space. Easily concealed. Natural 20 inflicts maximum + ULTIMATE.

entries.name: Blip Module
entries.description: A phase-movement augment. When you move, you do not pass through the space between the two locations.

entries.name: Cybernetics Loadout
entries.description: Your limbs and skeleton are augmented with nano fibers and duranium scaffolds. All forms of blunt impact inflict no damage.

entries.name: Zurin Symbiote
entries.description: The Zurin primordial form. This tiny organism binds to the spinal cord and enhances subtle empathy. 'Don't Die on me, man!' rolls are always EASY.

entries.name: Jump Pack
entries.description: A miniaturized ion thruster worn as a small backpack. Move twice on your TURN, even when taking an action or making an attack.
